other_title: Amai Chōbatsu: Watashi wa Kanshu Senyō Pet (Japanese)
甘い懲罰～私は看守専用ペット (Japanese)
달콤한 징벌 ~ 나는 간수 전용 애완동물 (Korean)
plot: Inside a prison in the near future, Hina Saotome — an office lady imprisoned despite her innocence — meets the elegant yet sadistic guard Aki Myojin. Hina's heart and body are at the mercy of Myojin's "cruel yet sweet domination" from physical examinations to even her lover's prison visits. (from manga)
